rules_text:
{W}{U} MYSTICS Rituals need ritualists. Amass a coven of Mystics to win.
{U}{B} EFFIGY Carve a totem of your threats to gain extra value from your discard effects.
{B}{R} AGGRO GODHOOD Ascend swiftly and brutally to immortality.
{R}{G} BLOODBORN A libation of gore brings extra value from your graveyard.
{G}{W} CREATURES Go wide and revolt against the gods themselves with your motley forces.
{W}{B} CONTROL GODHOOD Reach immortality slowly but inexorably.
{B}{G} RAMP Your destiny is greater than others. Go bigger and reach it.
{G}{U} SACRIFICE The gods demand tribute. Seek rewards in sacrifice.
{U}{R} BLOOD The holy blood sings your name. Drink deep.
{R}{W} MIDRANGE GODHOOD Control the battlefield and control your fate.
